txt.en: 'I have need of your help in another matter of metalsmithy. To our most esteemed heroes, we bestow a medal called the Crest of Valour, but it has been some time since we have had amongst us an artisan with the skill to craft these intricate devices. If you could find the time and resources to craft a few of these crests for us, we would be much obliged by your efforts on our behalf.'

'Ah, Crests of Valour, and finely made too. Our own smiths could craft no finer. It is a shame that so many of these medals will be awarded posthumously, but the honour of the fallen is as important as the honour of the living...perhaps more so, as it is all that remains to them.'

'We have more heroes than the means to honour them -- granted, most of them are already dead, or soon will be, but that is no reason to be lax in our duties to them.\n\n'See if you cannot find up some metals and forge something worthy of a hero!'
The Council of the North has need of tokens to bestow upon heroes of the war against Angmar.
Present your Crests of Valour to Hróar at Gath Forthnír
Hróar is at Gath Forthnír in Angmar.\n\nHróar has asked you to craft some Crests of Valour and bring them to him.
